name: Anvil
description: Slow nearby enemies by 40% for 3s upon activation

name: Astral Traveler
description: Gain 25% additional Movement Speed during Ghost Walk

name: Arc Lightning
description: You may target your Healing Totem with Chain Lightning and also increase the bounce range by 10%

name: Blackout
description: Your weapon attacks have a 5% chance to silence the target's abilities, deactivating them for 3s

name: Cluster
description: Chain Lightning now deals full weapon damage to all secondary targets

name: Conductor
description: 3% chance to turn target into a conductor for 4s, dealing 60 damage every 0.5s to all nearby targets.

name: Discharge
description: Deal 400 damage to enemies upon activation.

name: Distribution
description: Allies within 40ft gain 40% increased experience.

name: Electrical Imbalance
description: When Ghost Walk ends, deal 400 damage in an area around you.

name: Forethought
description: +40% more experience and your other cards recharge 80% faster

name: Gale
description: Targets affected by Healing Totem reduce Crowd Control by 25%

name: Hamstring
description: Your Weapon attacks slow enemies by 10% for 2s

name: Lightning Rod
description: Lightning strikes enemies near your totem once per second, dealing 120 damage

name: Healing Rain
description: Your Healing Totem heals for an additional +1.5% of the recipient's maximum Health per second

name: Manifest
description: Your Weapon attacks Mark the target, causing them to take 4% increased damage for 0.5s

name: Momentum
description: Your weapon shots instantly lower Chain Lightning's cooldown by 0.3s

name: Monolith Totem
description: Increase your Healing Totem Health by 500 and reduce the damage it takes by 5%

name: Overcharge
description: Increase the width of your lightning beam by 60%

name: Outreach
description: Increase the radius of Totem by 20%

name: Overload
description: Those affected have 30% Attack Speed

name: Planted
description: Root all nearby enemies for 1.5s upon activation

name: Phantom
description: Increase the duration of Ghost Walk by 1s and reduce the Cooldown by 5s

name: Precinct
description: You deal +75% more damage to enemies near your healing Totem

name: Sow the Seed
description: 4% chance to spawn a Healing Totem on your target

name: Spirit Steal
description: Colliding with in enemy during Ghost Walk summons a totem

name: Stimulate
description: Those affected deal 30% increased damage.

name: Totemic Rescue
description: When your Health is reduced below 30%, you place a Healing Totem at your feet and gain 40% Movement Speed for 4s

name: Thunderous Grace
description: Your Weapon attacks deal an additional 0.5% of the target's maximum health as damage per hit

name: Wind Totem
description: Those affected gain 20% Movement Speed for 2s

name: Invigorate
description: Increase Attack Speed by +8%. You and nearby allies are healed for 15% of the damage you deal with your weapon attacks

name: Crackle
description: Those affected take 4 less damage per hit

name: Unstable
description: Consecutive attacks stack increasing Damage by 3%, max. 5 stacks

name: Thunderstruck
description: Hitting a stealth target with your weapon reveals it for 1s
